body:
On Mar 21, 2008, at 5:42 PM, Greg Ward wrote:
> A quick google search of the terms "radiance materials library" led  
> to some online material from my old friend Kevin Matthews:
>
> 	http://www.designlaboratory.com/computing/tools/radiance/ 
> radmatlib.html
>
> There are some dependencies on some .cal files, which you may have  
> to find elsewhere.


I have looked for years to find those cal files.  I believe I emailed  
Arifice and/or Kevin directly many years ago for "dusty.cal", to no  
avail.  Anyone who has or obtains these cal files that's willing to  
share, I'll buy you a beer.


- Rob
